column4: can somebody help me i cant get my flash working well it works but everytime i start a flash video it pauses liek 3 seconds in or like when its buffering a song it just stops buffering
it was working 4 hours ago
why does nobody ever answer my question
its making me mad
whats your problem with flash?
it pauses when its buffering movies and songs
did you install the Adobe Flash Player plugin for Firefox or one of the others?
for firefox and firefox 3
I'm asking which flash plugin you installed though. Adobe or another flashplugin?
from the repos the adobe one
Maybe you should try a reboot?
Its working pretty fine for me. o.o
and i remove the /usr/lib/firefox and the /usr/lib/mozilla dirs and now it wont install going through firefox liek it says manual install
like a click missing plugins
I'm really not sure what to say, someone else needs to help you.
i dont know, he pretty much deleted the folders for it
perhaps finish out an uninstall than reinstall back, than reinstall the adobe flash plguin again
thanks the reboot made it work :]
Oh ^^
No problem jay-oh-en, I figured it would I  just wasnt so sure ^^
i thought it would too but why would a reboot fis that?
